document_data.caption: A map showing the Farfair River in eastern Gnarhelm.
document_data.name: Farfair River
document_data.mainbody: The '''Farfair River''' was the largest river in the kingdom of [[Gnarhelm]] on the island of [[Alaron]] within the [[Moonshae Isles]].{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: The Moonshae Isles}}
document_data.Geography: The Farfair River was located in eastern Gnarhelm near the border of [[Callidyrr]]. The river originated where the [[Lisbunt Mountains|Lisbunt]] and [[Fairheight Mountains]] met. It flowed west then north around the base of the Lisbunt Mountains before reaching [[Lake Sunder]]'s southern shore. The river continued on to the [[Sea of Swords]], exiting from the lake's eastern shore near the coast. The Farfair River flowed for approximately {{SI|70|mi|k|long=yes}} along its entire length.
